steps: Create 2 new individual mules with clean financial histories
Establish 1 new shell company with offshore bank account for consolidation
Mule #1 makes 3 deposits below $10k threshold to local bank accounts
Mule #2 makes 3 deposits below $10k threshold to different local bank accounts
Transfer funds from mule accounts to shell company's offshore account in increments
Conduct final transfers to legitimate business account under false ownership documentation
Distribute 'clean' funds through legitimate business transactions
evasion_techniques: Alternate deposit days between mules to avoid patterns
Use cash from multiple sources to confuse origin trails
Timing deposits to avoid daily deposit limits on single accounts
Create false employment documentation for mules to justify cash deposits
